name: Daji
skill: Deals 1582/1942 DMG to the 2 enemies with the least HP. Targets take 16%/19% more DMG for a limited time.

additional_data.description: A spirit of the most evil woman in all of history. She ruined the largest country in East Asia using her looks and wits as her only weapons. Her true form is a huge spirit, but nothing is known beyond that. With the enormous spirit essences under her control she can turn into human form and slip into human society. But these days she adjusted her looks a bit and is apparently living as a high school student. The catch is that in human form she can only use her supernatural powers for a few minutes at a time.

main: "So fun, school is just so fun..."
skill: "Let the ashes of destruction rain down."
limit_break: "Ah, my true power is revealed! Ha ha ha."
